titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Wednesday the 15th of December, 1680. Published by his Majesties command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Concerning the relationship between the King and Parliament and its effect on foreign affairs.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
